tag.description: Search for shipments based on the custom tag added to the shipment object

created_at_start.description: Used to create a filter for when a resource was created (ex. A shipment that was created after a certain time)

created_at_end.description: Used to create a filter for when a resource was created, (ex. A shipment that was created before a certain time)

modified_at_start.description: Used to create a filter for when a resource was modified (ex. A shipment that was modified after a certain time)

modified_at_end.description: Used to create a filter for when a resource was modified (ex. A shipment that was modified before a certain time)

page.description: Return a specific page of results. Defaults to the first page. If set to a number that's greater than the number of pages of results, an empty page is returned.

page_size.description: The number of results to return per response.

sort_dir.description: Controls the sort order of the query.

Controls the sort order of queries

|Value     |Description
|:---------|:-----------------------------------------------------
|`asc`     |Return results in ascending order
|`desc`    |Return results in descending order
sort_dir.title: sort_dir

shipments_sort_by.description: The possible shipments sort by values
shipments_sort_by.title: shipments_sort_by

$ul: **links**: Helpful links to other pages of results
**first**: A link to a related resource, or an empty object if there is no resource to link to
**href**: The URL of the linked resource, if any
**type**: The type of resource, or the type of relationship to the parent resource
**last**: A link to a related resource, or an empty object if there is no resource to link to
**href**: The URL of the linked resource, if any
**type**: The type of resource, or the type of relationship to the parent resource
**next**: A link to a related resource, or an empty object if there is no resource to link to
**href**: The URL of the linked resource, if any
**type**: The type of resource, or the type of relationship to the parent resource
**prev**: A link to a related resource, or an empty object if there is no resource to link to
**href**: The URL of the linked resource, if any
**type**: The type of resource, or the type of relationship to the parent resource

**total**: Total number of shipments returned by the api call
**errors**: The errors associated with the failed API call
**request_id**: A UUID that uniquely identifies the request id.
